title: Hay bale

properties.value: Hay bales are a form of interactive scenery found throughout farms in Old School RuneScape. Players can use a sack with a Hay bale or a haystack to get a hay sack, needed to craft a Scarecrow.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Hay bale
 This article could be improved by adding an image of Hay bale.
Please insert an existing image or if necessary, upload a new one.

Hay bales are a form of interactive scenery found throughout farms in Old School RuneScape. Players can use a sack with a Hay bale or a haystack to get a hay sack, needed to craft a Scarecrow.

Some hay bales can be searched with a 10% chance to find a needle.[1] When this occurs, the player will say "Wow! A needle! Now what are the chances of finding that?" However, there is a 2% chance that players will get pricked with the needle, causing them to lose one hitpoint.

Locations[edit | edit source]

Hay bale location in Draynor.

Haystacks and hay bales can be found in following locations:

  • North-east of Draynor Village, north of the potato field
  • South of Falador, in the chicken pen
  • Just east of the general store in Edgeville
  • North of East Ardougne, west of the sheep field
  • Just west of the windmill north of East Ardougne
  • Combat training room directly north of Varrock east bank
  • Lumbridge Farm - West of the cows
  • Just west of the Fairy Ring in the Realm of the Fisher King
  • South-east area of the Ranging Guild
  • Just south of the Farming Guild, in the chicken pen

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The chance to receive a needle is a reference to the idiom "a needle in a haystack", referring to something that is difficult or impossible to locate.
    • Despite this, the 10% chance is quite high for an item drop.

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ^ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 25 October 2018. (Archived from the original on 29 May 2020.) Mod Ash: "10% [to receive a needle]. Also there's a 2% chance of getting pricked without succeeding in taking the needle."

{{Needs image}}
'''Hay bales''' are a form of interactive scenery found throughout farms in ''[[Old School RuneScape]]''. Players can use a [[sack]] with a Hay bale or a haystack to get a [[hay sack]], needed to craft a [[Scarecrow]].

Some hay bales can be searched with a 10% chance to find a [[needle]].{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/1056603985342275585|date=25 October 2018|archiveurl=https://archive.is/0V0Aw|archivedate=29 May 2020|quote=10% [to receive a needle]. Also there's a 2% chance of getting pricked without succeeding in taking the needle.}} When this occurs, the player will say "''Wow! A needle! Now what are the chances of finding that?''" However, there is a 2% chance that players will get pricked with the needle, causing them to lose one [[hitpoint]].

==Locations==
[[File:Hay bale location.png|thumb|222x222px|Hay bale location in Draynor.]]
[[Haystack]]s and hay bales can be found in following locations:

*North-east of [[Draynor Village]], north of the [[potato]] field
*South of [[Falador]], in the [[chicken]] pen
*Just east of the [[general store]] in [[Edgeville]]
*North of [[East Ardougne]], west of the [[sheep]] field
*Just west of the [[windmill]] north of [[East Ardougne]]
*Combat training room directly north of [[Varrock]] east bank
*Lumbridge Farm - West of the [[Cow|cows]]
*Just west of the [[Fairy rings|Fairy Ring]] in the [[Fisher Realm|Realm of the Fisher King]]
*South-east area of the [[Ranging Guild]]
*Just south of the [[Farming Guild]], in the chicken pen

==Trivia==
* The chance to receive a needle is a reference to the idiom "[[wiktionary:needle_in_a_haystack|a needle in a haystack]]", referring to something that is difficult or impossible to locate.
** Despite this, the 10% chance is quite high for an item drop.
